channel.title: Meme King (Joke class suggestion)
channel.description:
**Meme King**
**Holy memes (Passive)** Cannot be bleed poisoned or killed at night
**Dead meme execution (day ability)** Kill someone who has referred to a dead meme
**Call of memes (day ability)** Your vote counts as 2 votes
**The king go skkkra (night ability)** anyone who visits you will not be able to talk for the rest if the day
**yeet (Night ability)** kill someone
